titles.title: open the eyes of my heart lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Open the Eyes of my Heart Lord newline Open the Eyes of my Heart newline I want to see you, newline I want to see you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To see you high and lifted up newline Shining in the light of your glory newline Pour out your power and love newline as we sing holy, holy, holy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Holy, Holy, Holy, newline Holy, Holy, Holy, newline Holy, holy, holy... newline I want to see you.
